spec_data.Name: gnome-subtitles
spec_data.License: GPLv2+ and (MPLv1.1 or GPLv2+ or LGPLv2+)
spec_data.Description:
Gnome Subtitles is a subtitle editor for the GNOME desktop. It supports the
most common text-based subtitle formats and allows for subtitle editing,
translation and synchronization.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 06:13:57 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
